sentences.en: a staunch supporter of the monarchy
sentences.cn: 坚定地拥护君主制的人

sentences.en: As long as most people are happy to have the monarchy, the abolitionist position is an arrogant fantasy.
sentences.cn: 只要大多数人还乐意保留君主制，废除它的主张就是痴人说梦。

sentences.en: By 1180 the native Monarchy of Ireland had gone to pieces.
sentences.cn: 1180年左右,爱尔兰的本国王朝瓦解了.

sentences.en: I have sworn an oath of loyalty to the monarchy.
She thinks it's time we did away with the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 她认为该是废除君主制的时候了.

sentences.en: The monarchy has to create a balance between its public and private lives.
sentences.cn: 皇室成员不得不在公众生活和私生活之间建立起一种平衡。

sentences.en: The monarchy is seen by many people as an anachronism in the modern world.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为君主制在现代世界不合时宜。

sentences.en: The monarchy mystifies, no doubt of that - in the full sense of the term " mystification " .
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,君主制给人们以神秘感.这是货真价实的 神秘感.
可怕的君主垄断了君主国。

sentences.en: The mystique surrounding the monarchy has gone for ever.
sentences.cn: 王室的神秘性已经一去不复返。

sentences.en: The power of the monarchy in Britain today is more symbolical than real.
sentences.cn: 今日英国君主的权力多为象徵性的,无甚实际意义.

sentences.en: The power of the monarchy was circumscribed by the new law.
sentences.cn: 君主统治的权力受到了新法律的制约。

sentences.en: To them, the monarchy is the special symbol of nationhood.
sentences.cn: 在他们看来，君主制是独立国地位的特殊象征。

sentences.en: Twenty-five of his supporters petitioned him to restore the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 他的拥护者中有25个人请求他复辟。

sentences.en: We are beginning to muddle the extended royal family and the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始混淆皇室大家庭和君主制这两个概念了。

words.tran_cn: 君主的，君主政治的；国王的
君主政体的；君主的；赞成君主政体的
君主的，国王的；君主政治的
君主政体；君主国；君主政治

trans.tran_cn: 君主政体，君主政治，君主国
trans.tran_en: the system in which a country is ruled by a king or queen
